heisig_chinese_memo: The spine of a good camping adventure is having a great tent and fire (a firehouse) which make you feel as cozy as when you are in a house.
Ru_trainchinese: yíng: (сущ/глаг) батальон; лагерь; управлять, ведать; строить; стремиться к
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The financial spine of the greenhouse is the children's camps it holds to gather funding.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " palace ", " fluorescent " provincial sound, the original meaning of the soil around the base for the door. "Shuowen": "City residence. From the palace, the sound of the province." Duan Yucai's note: "Sijing means to live around, such as the city camp is called 阛, and the military base is called camp. "Xijing Fu>: "Tongjing belts". Xue's note: "Ying, the city is also". The middle door is also. Cui Bao said: "The city wall is the door, and the city door is the door." Sun's Xingyan said: "Yingjing" "Yin Jin", such as the self-employed saying that Han Feizi makes a self-circulation, and it is also a guilt in the long-term. Zhuge Kongming expresses: "The matter in the camp." It is also called the military base. The extension is management. Yingzhi. All the rules are called camp. From the palace, the lower body is not from the palace. Today, the li is province, and the mistake is also. Li Wenzhong's word is not mistaken. The sound of the sound. It is said that the disaster is omitted. Sound but save fire is different."

Pre-Qin classics are used as the original meaning, such as "Mencius·Teng Wengong 2": "The lower one is the nest, the upper one is the camp cave." "The Book of Rites·Li Yun": "In winter, you live in the camp cave, and in the summer you live in the nest."

" Camp " is also used for military camps and camps. The former is like "Historical Records · Jianghou Zhoubo Family": "The emperor walks according to his bridle. At the camp, the general Yafu said with his troops: "The soldiers of Jiezu do not worship, please give me a military salute. See.""; the latter is like "Sui Shu·Li Mi Biography": "Shi Chong camped in Losi".

" Ying " is also used as an area, such as "Tai Xuan·Tu": "The sun and the moon camp, the Yin and the Yang cross." Fan Wang's note: "The camp, the camp area."

" Ying " can also be used for construction and operation. The former is like "Fengshi's Hearing and Seeing Records Mingtang" in Tang Dynasty: "The strong wind will destroy it, and the camp will be heavy." The latter is like "Huainanzi Zhushu": "Zhizheng" In camp affairs, it is slanderous and treacherous to enter."

" Ying " also has the meaning of measurement. For example, in "Lu Shi Chunqiu Meng Dongji": "Yingqiu ridge is small, big, high, low and thick."

" Camp " also has the meaning of seeking. As we said today, "employment" and "rescue" all have this meaning. The ancient book "Shuo Ming Shang" has the meaning of "make all workers seek the wild"; it also has the meaning of thinking, such as "Lie Zi·Zhou Mu Wang": "Yin's heart is in the world, worrying about the Zhong family's business, and the heart is tired."

The meaning of " ying " as a guard is also found in ancient books, such as "Mozi Tianzhi": "The power of the desire to live together."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " gong ", " ying " to save the sound, the original meaning is to live on the surrounding soil.
humanum_full_description:
從「宮」，「熒」省聲，本義為四周垒土而居。《說文》：「市居也。从宮，熒省聲。」段玉裁注：「帀居謂圍繞而居，如市營曰闤，軍壘曰營皆是也。〈西京賦〉：『通闤帶闠』。薛注：『闤，市營也』。闠，中隔門也。崔豹曰：『市牆曰闤，市門曰闠。』孫氏星衍曰：『營闤音近』，如自營曰厶今本韓非子作自環，在煢煢在疚亦作嬛嬛是也。諸葛孔明表云：『營中之事。』謂軍壘也。引伸之爲經營，營治。凡有所規度皆謂之營。从宮，下體从宫不省。今隷皆省，誤也。李文仲字鑒不誤。熒省聲。謂省去灾也。與他熒省聲但省下火者異。」

　　先秦典籍用作本義，如《孟子·滕文公下》：「下者為巢，上者為營窟。」《禮記·禮運》：「冬則居營窟，夏則居橧巢。」

　　「營」也用作軍營、紮營，前者如《史記·绛侯周勃世家》：「天子乃按轡徐行。至營，將軍亞夫持兵揖曰：『介胄之士不拜，請以軍禮見。』」；後者如《隋書·李密傳》：「世充營於洛西」。

　　「營」還用作區域，如《太玄·圖》：「日月畛營，陰陽沈交。」范望注：「營，營域也。」

　　「營」亦可作建造、經營，前者如唐代封演《封氏聞見記·明堂》：「大風摧倒，重營之。」後者有如《淮南子·主術》：「執正營事，則讒佞姦邪無由進矣。」

　　「營」也有測度之義，如《呂氏春秋孟冬紀》：「營丘壟之小大高卑薄厚之度」。

　　「營」還有謀求之義，如今天所言「營生」、「營救」，皆出此義。古書《書·說命上》則有「使百工營求諸野」；也有思慮之義，如《列子·周穆王》：「尹氏心營世事，慮鍾家業，心形俱疲。」

　　「營」作護衛之義也見於古書，如《墨子天志中》：「欲人之力相營」。
humanum_short_description: 從「宮」，「熒」省聲，本義為四周垒土而居。

(Simplified: 营)
Chinese Definition:
  • ⿳ Above to middle and below
    • 炏 [ kài ] grass
    • 冖 [ mì ] cover
    • 吕 [ lǚ ] a musical note; surname
①軍隊駐紮的地方，借指按編制集體生活的地方：營地。營房。營壘。軍營。野營。陣營。步步爲營(軍隊前進一步就設一道營壘，喻行動謹慎，防備極嚴)。
②軍隊的編制單位，連的上一級。
③籌劃，管理，建設：營業。營作。營田。營造。經營。國營。私營。
④謀求：營求。營生。營救。營養。鑽營。
⑤姓氏。
營養 [ yíng yǎng ]: nutrition; nourishment; Classifiers: 种
營造 [ yíng zào ]: to build (housing); to construct; to make
(Simplified: 营)
Chinese Definition:

Chinese: The spine of a good camping adventure is having a great tent and fire (a firehouse) which make you feel as cozy as when you are in a house.
Meaning: camp
Hanzi: 营
Story: The financial spine of the greenhouse is the children's camps it holds to gather funding.
Kind: traditional

營字的基本解释

營
yíng
见“营”。

營字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yíng］
［《廣韻》余傾切，平清，以。］
“营1”的繁体字。
(1)环绕而居；四围垒土而居。
(2)同“縈”。围绕；缠绕。
(3)军营；营寨。
(4)扎营。
(5)区域；边界。
(6)虚，方位。
(7)军队编制单位名称。古今不同，今制上属团，下辖连。亦有不属于团的独立营。
(8)汉代的地方武装。参见“營長”。
(9)建造；制作。
(10)经营。
(11)掌管。参见“營事”。
(12)置办；举办。
(13)耕作。
(14)需求；谋求。
(15)谋虑；思虑。
(16)丈量。
(17)从东到西的方向。
(18)卫护；救助。
(19)灵魂。
(20)通“”。迷惑。
(21)通“瑩”。磨治。参见“營拂”。
(22)古州名。古九州之一。在今山东半岛。参见“九州”。
(23)古州名。古十二州之一。在今辽宁省一带。见《书·尧典》“肇十有二州”汉郑玄注。
(24)古州名。後魏太平真君五年置。治所龙城，即今辽宁省朝阳市。隋唐两代营州治所皆在

營字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　營； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页684第17
【唐韻】【集韻】余傾切【韻會】維傾切，?音塋。【說文】市居也。从宮，熒省聲。　又【玉篇】度也。【廣韻】造也。【詩·大雅】經之營之。【箋】營表其位。又【小雅】肅肅謝功，召伯營之。【箋】營治也。【易·繫辭】四營而成易。【疏】四度經營蓍策，乃成易之一變也。【韻會】東西爲經，周迴爲營。　又【詩·小雅】營營靑蠅。【傳】營營，往來貌。【釋文】營說文作謍。小聲也。　又【禮·禮運】營窟。【疏】地高則穴，地下則營壘，其土爲窟。　又【韻會】軍壘曰營。【史記·黃帝紀】以師兵爲營衞。【註】正義曰：環繞軍兵爲營，以自衞轅門，卽其遺象。　又【老子·道德經】載營魄抱一，能無離乎。【註】營，䰟也。一曰衞也。　又營室，星名。【禮·月令】孟春之月，日在營室。　又【前漢·王莽傳】人民正營。【註】師古曰：正營惶恐不安之意也。正音征。　又【後漢·淸河王慶傳】夙夜屏營。【註】屏營，彷徨也。　又【前漢·劉向傳】所以營惑耳目。【註】師古曰：營謂回繞之。又【敘傳】營信巫史。【註】鄧展曰營惑也。　

營字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
營字的起名意思

暂无。

camp
Basic explanation of words
camp
yíng
See "Camp".
camp
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yíng］
["Guangyun" Yu Qingqi, calm and clear, to. ]
Traditional characters for "营1".
(1) Surrounding and living; surrounding and enclosing soil and living.
(2) Same as "ying". Around; entangled.
(3) Barracks; camps.
(4) Set up camp.
(5) Area; boundary.
(6) Virtual, orientation.
(7) The name of the army establishment unit. The ancient and modern are different. There are also independent camps that are not part of the regiment.
(8) Local armed forces in the Han Dynasty. See "battalion commander".
(9) Construction; production.
(10) Operation.
(11) In charge. See "camp".
(12) Purchase; hold.
(13) Farming.
(14) Demand; seek.
(15) Thinking; thinking.
(16) Measurement.
(17) The direction from east to west.
(18) Guarding; Rescue.
(19) Soul.
(20) Pass "". confuse.
(21) Through "ying". Grinding. See "Ying Fu".
(22) The name of the ancient state. One of ancient Kyushu. In today's Shandong Peninsula. See "Kyushu".
(23) The name of the ancient state. One of the ancient twelve states. In today's Liaoning Province area. See "Shu Yaodian" "Zhao Shi has two prefectures" Han Zhengxuan's note.
(24) The name of the ancient state. After Wei Taiping Zhenjun five years old. The governing place was Longcheng, now Chaoyang City, Liaoning Province. Both the Sui and Tang Dynasties were in Yingzhou
camp
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　ying; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 684 17
